metadata.title: Learn FB15K Dataset with ComplEx as described by Trouillon et al., 2016
metadata.comments: In the paper it is not mentioned that they compute the mean of the vector norms as done in the published code base. The rank type can be found at https://github.com/ttrouill/complex/blob/67fef2324d5a7695f7b932b5606d2e4b6de09a41/efe/evaluation.py#L295.
